In England, in the seven days to 22 November, there were 245,488 new confirmed cases (434.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 November, there were 229,078 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% (16,410 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 November is 8,574,315 (15,162.3 cases per 100,000 population).
